channel.title: Machine Learning on Huzaif
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Huzaif

item.description: Cloud Computing & Modern day ML From being able to run tensorflow on collab to training models on sagemaker, By using cloud, complicated tasks of installing and managing dependencies on your local computer are taken care of. Not to mention worring about the limiting factors of your hardware. Cloud computing makes practice of ML accessible to everyone and implementation readily availabe. Evolvement and need of Machine Learning: We know, Machine Learning has evolved tremendously over the past decade and now has applications in nearly every field.
